channel.title: No-ip problem, Please Help
channel.description: this is the first time ive ever used no-ip. I have it downloaded and everything. Now i set up a host called AluminamScape.no-ip.org. My brother used the client made for it, put in the ip, he was on a different network. But server doesn't say it got a connection and he cant get on, i selected it, when i go over the ip thing it says my actual ip address, so how do i use it?

item.title: No-ip problem, Please Help
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

hey i can help you through teamviewer no problem. just pm me your id and pass.

If you do not have teamviewer go to teamviewer.com and download the full version and install it then run it you will get an id and a pass pm it to me

Read full topic
